Title: Phoenix Edge Gateway
Body: API: POST /v1/generate, GET /v1/events (SSE), POST /telegram/webhook. Guards: OIDC, tenant, rate-limit, circuit-break, quotas. DoD: TLS 1.3; Prom metrics.

Title: aMCP Envelope v1
Body: Struct: %Envelope{id, tenant, causal_id, nonce, ts, schema_v, priority, policy_ref}. Fns: validate/1, sign/verify. DoD: schema_v gated.

Title: Replay Protection at Edge
Body: NonceBloom + TTL; counters exported. DoD: Duplicate/non-fresh blocked; replay_rejects_total visible.

Title: Tamper-Evident Audit
Body: Append-only JSONL + rolling prev_hash; daily anchor record. CLI verify. DoD: Any range verifies; admin actions emit proof.

Title: Admin Console (Read-Only)
Body: Routes: /admin/overview, /admin/traffic, /admin/audit. DoD: LiveView charts, trace link & envelope drill-down.

Title: Telegram Agent → Webhook + RBAC
Body: Allow-list admin chat IDs; per-chat rate-limit; audit commands. DoD: Commands throttled; audit offset returned.

Title: GoldRush Rules (Shadow Mode)
Body: Rules: burst_traffic, refusal_spike, cost_anomaly. DoD: FP/FN stats recorded; no mutations.

Title: LLM SOP Drafts
Body: Batch telemetry → prompt LLM → SOP.Draft persisted. DoD: One incident summarized into a stored draft.

Title: k6/Artillery Harness
Body: Scenarios: hit-heavy, miss-heavy, mixed @100rps. DoD: SLO gates wired into CI.

Title: CAIL.CID + IPFS Bridge
Body: API: put/1 -> cid, get/1, pin/unpin, stat, verify/2. DoD: Test vectors pass.

Title: CAIL.Provenance (Merkle-DAG)
Body: API: link(child, parents, meta), verify_path/2. DoD: Random DAGs verify; lineage retrievable.

Title: Cross-Surface Memory
Body: Contract: conversation_cid per user/session. DoD: Telegram recall via CID; admin detail shows memory.

Title: Deterministic Cache @ Edge
Body: Keys: model+params_hash+input_hash. API: get/put/invalidate, prefetch. DoD: Hit-ratio chart.

Title: CEP → Workflow Hooks
Body: Behaviour: Workflow.run(playbook, ctx). DoD: Shadow→Active toggle; playbook executes.

Title: Zombie Detection & Drain
Body: Gossip heartbeat, suspect after N misses. DoD: Auto-drain suspect nodes; log visible.

Title: Quantizer (PQ/VQ)
Body: API: fit/1, encode/1, decode/1; recall/storage knobs. DoD: Recall@10 target met.

Title: HNSW ANN
Body: API: upsert/2, search/3; concurrent insert/search. DoD: p95 & recall targets met.

Title: BeliefSet (Delta-CRDT)
Body: Types: notes/tasks/policies; decay & confidence. DoD: Multi-node convergence metric shown.

Title: Policy → WASM Pipeline
Body: Spec → wasm_module; served at /policies/:id.wasm; SSE install. DoD: One policy live in client; telemetry round-trip.

Title: Live Stream Relay (Astro Demo)
Body: RTMP/WebRTC ingest → media.ingest events; Telegram announces. DoD: Start/stop events visible.

Title: Twitter Spaces Bridge (MVP)
Body: Schedule/announce via API; join link stored. DoD: Admin + Telegram show live Spaces link.

Title: SDKs (Elixir/Rust/JS)
Body: Envelope helpers, signing, SSE client, retry/backoff. DoD: Quickstart works in CI.

Title: Rules Catalog & Marketplace
Body: Export/import packs; signed bundles. DoD: Pack moves between envs with signatures verified.
